overview: Philippe is a co-inventor of the first reliable and mass-produced Display Visa and MasterCard Payment Card on the world market. In order to mass deploy this technology, he co-founded NagraID Security. His products are now available in numerous countries through major banks and security companies such as Bank of America, Paypal, HSBC, PostFinance, TEB, Getin, Banco Bicentenario, Ertse Bank, ING, Interactive Brokers and others. As an inventor, Philippe also created other power-embedded ISO cards such as sound and acoustic security ISO tokens. He has been in the computer security business for the last 20 years. His skills in microelectronics and software development gave him the opportunity to work in various IT sectors (notably on-board systems for aeronautics, speech recognition, toll interactive TV and intrusion systems).
